summary: Premium tier website plan for Cypress Bridge Candle Co. featuring high‑quality visuals, subtle animations, in‑depth content, robust SEO, lead capture, and optional integrations for e‑commerce, social, and analytics.
sections: Shop Category Grid with filter & sort
Product Detail Layout (image zoom, video, spec, add to cart, upsell)
Blog Posts Grid with categories & tags
style_notes: Warm neutral palette (beige, amber, charcoal) with subtle gold accents. Use of high‑resolution product and lifestyle images, slow‑motion video backgrounds, parallax scrolling, micro‑interactions (hover fades, button press animations), and CSS grid for responsive layout. Typography: modern sans‑serif (e.g., Montserrat) for headings, serif (e.g., Playfair Display) for body text. Dark mode option. SEO‑optimized meta tags, schema markup, and structured data for products.
assets_needed: High‑resolution product photos (front, back, close‑up, lifestyle)
Lifestyle images of candles in home settings
Short promotional video (30‑60s) for Hero section
Copy for brand story, production process, sustainability, FAQs, terms, privacy
Icon set for UI elements (cart, wishlist, filters)
SEO keyword list & meta description drafts
Analytics tracking IDs (Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, optional e‑commerce tracking)
Email template for newsletter signup confirmation
